name: Qatar's Second Best Business Class - is it any good??
description:
Qatar's Q-Suite business class is considered by most the very best business class flying today.  But how good is Qatar's second best business class?

Join me as I check out Qatar's Second Best Business Class on a flight from Madrid to Doha on the beautiful Airbus A350.  

This business class flight review will cover my check-in and struggle with Madrid's beautiful airport, boarding, departure, the Qatar business class seat, inflight dining and of course the onboard service from the Qatar crew. 

Links referred to in the video:

Ryanair Flight Review:  https://youtu.be/mmA1fKsxCIg
Qatar Q-Suite Review:  https://youtu.be/Pw5h6rILQ4k

Remember to check out my channel and subscribe if that's your thing. 

Happy travels

cheers

Dennis

#qatarbusinessclass #qatarflightreview
